greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Least number with the prime signature of n^2; square of the least number with the prime signature of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Times @@ MapIndexed[(Prime@ First@ #2)^#1 &, #] &@ If[Length@ # == 1 && #[[1, 1]] == 1, {0}, Reverse@ Sort@ #[[All, -1]]] &@ FactorInteger[ n^2], {n, 120}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 21 2016 *)
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i])^2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 03 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 19 2016
